Verses: 1 karththarai Nambugiravargal Endrendraikkum Asaiyaamal Nilaiththirukkum Seeyon Parvadhaththaippol Iruppaargal.
2 parvadhangal Erusalemai Sutrilum Irukkumaappol, Karththar Idhumudhal Endrendraikkum Thammudaiya Janaththai Sutrilum Irukkiraar.
3 needhimaangal Aniyaayaththirku Thangal Kaigalai Neettaadhapadikku, Aagaamiyaththin Kodungol Needhimaangaludaiya Sudhandharaththinmel Nilaiththiraadhu.
5 thangal Konalaana Vazhigalukku Saaikiravargalai Karththar Akkiramakkaararode Pogappannuvaar. Isravelukko Samaadhaanamundu.
